code: import{createAction,createActions}from'redux-actions';import{LOGOUT,CLEAR_ERROR}from'constants/actionType';export var loginAction=createActions({loginRequest:function loginRequest(payload){return payload;},loginSuccess:function loginSuccess(payload){return payload;},loginFailure:function loginFailure(error){return error;}});export var updateProfileAction=createActions({updateProfileRequest:function updateProfileRequest(payload){return payload;},updateProfileSuccess:function updateProfileSuccess(payload){return payload;},updateProfileFailure:function updateProfileFailure(error){return error;}});export var logout=createAction(LOGOUT);export var clearError=createAction(CLEAR_ERROR);
